name: shader-studio
description: GLSL shader viewer for shadertoy and shader toy shaders

commands.title: Shader Studio: Generate Config for GLSL File
Shader Studio: Transpile GLSL to JavaScript (for debugging)

shader-studio.webServerPort.description: Port number for the HTTP web server

shader-studio.webSocketPort.description: Port number for the WebSocket server (requires restart)

shader-studio.enableSnippets.description: Enable GLSL code snippets for common Shadertoy patterns (requires restart)

shader-studio.defaultConfigView.description: Default view for .sha.json files: 'gui' for the visual editor, 'code' for the JSON source. (requires restart)

scripts.copy-glsl-to-dist: rimraf dist/node_modules && cpx "../node_modules/glsl-transpiler/**/*" dist/node_modules/glsl-transpiler && cpx "../node_modules/inherits/**/*" dist/node_modules/inherits && cpx "../node_modules/through2/**/*" dist/node_modules/through2 && cpx "../node_modules/through/**/*" dist/node_modules/through && cpx "../node_modules/glsl-tokenizer/**/*" dist/node_modules/glsl-tokenizer && cpx "../node_modules/glsl-parser/**/*" dist/node_modules/glsl-parser && cpx "../node_modules/xtend/**/*" dist/node_modules/xtend && cpx "../node_modules/subscript/**/*" dist/node_modules/subscript && cpx "../node_modules/prepr/**/*" dist/node_modules/prepr && cpx "../node_modules/pick-by-alias/**/*" dist/node_modules/pick-by-alias && cpx "../node_modules/strip-json-comments/**/*" dist/node_modules/strip-json-comments && cpx "../node_modules/parenthesis/**/*" dist/node_modules/parenthesis && cpx "../node_modules/object-assign/**/*" dist/node_modules/object-assign && cpx "../node_modules/jsep/**/*" dist/node_modules/jsep && cpx "../node_modules/escaper/**/*" dist/node_modules/escaper && cpx "../node_modules/expression-eval/**/*" dist/node_modules/expression-eval && cpx "../node_modules/core-util-is/**/*" dist/node_modules/core-util-is && cpx "../node_modules/balanced-match/**/*" dist/node_modules/balanced-match && cpx "../node_modules/readable-stream/**/*" dist/node_modules/readable-stream && cpx "../node_modules/isarray/**/*" dist/node_modules/isarray && cpx "../node_modules/string_decoder/**/*" dist/node_modules/string_decoder && cpx "../node_modules/process-nextick-args/**/*" dist/node_modules/process-nextick-args && cpx "../node_modules/util-deprecate/**/*" dist/node_modules/util-deprecate
scripts.package: npm run build:ui && npm run build:shader-explorer && node esbuild.js --production && npm run copy-glsl-to-dist
scripts.build:force: cd ../types && npm run build && cd ../rendering && npm run build && cd ../extension && npm run build:ui && npm run build:shader-explorer && tsc -p ./
scripts.build: cd ../types && npm run build && cd ../rendering && npm run build && cd ../extension && npm run build:ui && npm run build:shader-explorer && tsc -p ./
scripts.build:ui: cd ../ui && npm run build && npm run copy-to-extension
scripts.build:shader-explorer: cd ../shader-explorer && npm run build && npm run copy-to-extension
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
